title: Coffee, Tea, or Murder?
description: A brand new mystery in the USA Today bestselling series from America's favorite sleuth.  Ms. Fletcher learns that the friendly skies aren't so friendly after all.  When Cabot Cove's own Wayne Silverton debuts his new airline, he invites Jessica Fletcher and other locals on the inaugural flight from Boston to London. Jessica is thrilled for the opportunity to visit her dear friend, Scotland Yard Inspector George Sutherland. But the reunion hits turbulence when George is called to the airport to investigate the apparent murder of Wayne Silverton.  Jessica and George decide to put their sleuthing skills together. But there's a full passenger list of suspects-and Jessica's going to have to catch a killer before she can catch a flight home.
author: Jessica Fletcher
